summary: This is a brief email chain from December 2018 discussing lawmakers calling on the Department of Justice to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to Jeffrey Epstein. The participants are scheduling a time to touch base on the matter.

events.title: Lawmakers Demand DOJ Probe of Epstein NPA
events.description: Various lawmakers call on the Department of Justice to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement given to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, described as a 'sweetheart deal'.

keyFacts: In December 2018, lawmakers were publicly demanding an explanation from the DOJ regarding Jeffrey Epstein's Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).
The email references a news article from NBC News detailing these demands, characterizing the deal as a 'sweetheart deal'.
The correspondence shows individuals within an organization (likely legal or political) coordinating to discuss the emerging political pressure around the Epstein case.
